summary: The diff implements a comprehensive rebuild of the Noventra.Ai landing page generator. All major requirements from REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be addressed: session management (create, list, delete), chat interface with code block rendering, AI-generated landing page scaffolds, live preview, backend persistence with owner-based access control, and the full dark theme design system with OKLCH tokens, glassmorphism, glow effects, and the required typography. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetup modal for first-time user name entry
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a user profile setup flow or name collection modal. The ProfileSetup component and associated getCallerUserProfile/saveCallerUserProfile backend methods were not requested in the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: urlParams utility with admin token / caffeineAdminToken handling
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request makes no mention of an admin token, caffeineAdminToken, or URL parameter persistence utilities. This appears to be carried over from an unrelated template.
